title: Dzmitry Lebedzew
text:
Dzmitry Lebedzew (; ; born 13 May 1986) is a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er, who plays as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> for <a href="FC%20Belshina%20Bobruisk">Belshina Bobruisk</a>.
His brother <a href="Alyaksandr%20Lebedzew">Alyaksandr Lebedzew</a> is also a professional footballer.
Career.
Born in <a href="Soligorsk">Soligorsk</a>, Lebedzew began playing football in <a href="FC%20Shakhtyor%20Soligorsk">FC Shakhtyor Soligorsk</a>'s youth system. He didn't make any senior appearances for the club, and moved to <a href="FC%20Smorgon">FC Smorgon</a> where he made his <a href="Belarusian%20Premier%20League">Belarusian Premier League</a> debut in 2007.
